item.title: Re: 7 day bonus page
item.content:encoded: Small correction: If you have bonus stamina and are in a village with BurgerNinja, it'll drop to the level it would have been at without the BurgerNinja upgrade if you leave the village.

item.title: Re: 7 day bonus page
item.content:encoded:
It's 5 per hour, unless you're in a village with the BurgerNinja Upgrade, in which case it's 6.

The stamina gets counted one hour past when you last put in the code. If you put in the code at 5:37 PM, stamina becomes available at 6:37 PM. If you wait until 6:45 to put in the code, you won't get more stamina until 7:45. And so on, and so forth.

Bonus Stamina can't go over 60, but it never decreases, even across Dayroll. It helps to know this if you're going after something big, so you can let it build to max the previous day, and claim the stamina right after Roll.

item.title: 7 day bonus page
item.content:encoded:
I think we could add a day on the 7, 14, and 21 day bonuses. I was doing some research for my Sannin run, and we have nothing about it (as far as I know) in the wiki at all.

The bonuses are quoted from the site:

Daily +30 Stamina Bonus received!
7 Day Bonus!
+100 Stamina!
14 Day Bonus!
+20,000 Jutsu XP!
21 Day Bonus!
+20,000 G/N/T AP!

I do not believe that the 14 day bonus counts towards daily ranking, so that should be noted as well.
